pkgmetadata.longdescription: Survivor Function Estimation for Doubly Interval-Censored Failure Time Data // Contains the discrete nonparametric survivor function estimation algorithm of De Gruttola and Lagakos for doubly interval-censored failure time data and the discrete nonparametric survivor function estimation algorithm of Sun for doubly interval-censored left-truncated failure time data [Victor De Gruttola Stephen W. Lagakos (1989) doi:10.2307/2532030] [Jianguo Sun (1995) doi:10.2307/2533008].
